levelList.name: Sintonia Massima S.F.A 【Corrosione Deteriorata】
levelList.desc:
Dopo aver usato questa Abilità, muore.
- Se i PV vanno sotto 1 mentre usa questa Abilità, mantiene i PV a 1 finché non conclude l'Abilità.
[WhenUse] Infligge +7.5% danni per ogni 5 [Combustion] su di sé (max 30%)
[WhenUse] A 10+ ([Combustion] su di sé + [Combustion] sul bersaglio), Potere Base +1
[WhenUse] Potere Moneta +1 per ogni 30% dei propri PV mancanti (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Peso Attacco +1 per ogni 20% dei propri PV mancanti (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Infligge +10% danni per ogni 20% dei propri PV mancanti (max 30%)

[WhenUse] Potere Base +1 per ogni 10 ([Combustion] su di sé + [Combustion] sul bersaglio) (max 2)
[WhenUse] Potere Moneta +1 per ogni 30% dei propri PV mancanti (max 3)
[BeforeAttack] Peso Attacco +1 per ogni 20% dei propri PV mancanti (max 4)

levelList.name: Unfold Bowblade [弓刀]
levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">If this unit does not have [ArrowShiFau], activate "Evade" instead

[StartBattle] If this unit is about to use "Bow's Glimmer", use "Evade" instead
[StartBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], gain (36 / [AimForTheGoal] Stack) Shield for the turn (once per turn)

[EndBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], and did not use an Attack Skill this turn, gain 1 [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)
[EndBattle] If this unit does not have [SnipingArrowMode], and has 1+ [ArrowShiFau], gain 1 of each [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)</style>

levelList.name: Bow's Glimmer [閃弓]
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
Deal +24% damage for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 72%)
Deal +24% damage on Critical Hit for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 72%)
- At 4 [AimForTheGoal], instead of the two above effects, deal +444% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] At 4+ [Breath], Base Power +2
[WhenUse] Coin Power +2 for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 4)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] for every [AimForTheGoal]
[EndSkill] Lose ([AimForTheGoal] x 5) [Breath]
[EndSkill] Remove [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] from self

[EndSkill] Remove [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] from self
